description:
January 11: Westbrook (Single Tracking)

The Blue Line will be single tracking at Westbrook Station on Sunday, January 11, starting at 10:30 p.m. until the end of service.

You will need to use the westbound platform at Westbrook Station (heading towards 69 Street) for both directions of travel during this time.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
